thread.title: Fire investigation underway in South Burlington
thread.title_full: Fire investigation underway in South Burlington - WCAX.COM Local Vermont News, Weather and Sports-

author: WCAX News
title: Fire investigation underway in South Burlington
text:
SOUTH BURLINGTON, Vt. - Fire shut down part of one of Chittenden County's busiest roads Thursday night.
South Burlington firefighters were called to the former Hollywood Video store at the intersection of Williston and Patchen Roads at about 10:20 p.m.
Multiple crews responded to help, and police shut down the road heading westbound.
It took about an hour to get the fire under control.
No one was hurt.
The roads are all back open, and fire investigators will be on the scene Friday morning to try to figure out how it started.
